name: Trail (itch) (warrior.parab)
description:
The goal of the protagonist in the cause-and-effect game Trial is to accrue points. The protagonist’s trial continues down the same path as before. We must always choose a different route to avoid being struck by our own track. Enjoy the Trail’s compelling story.

How to Play?

  1. A play button on the main menu activates the game.
  2. After starting the game, the user’s objective is to move the character and score as many points as possible.
  3. Keyboard arrow controls are to be used to direct the character’s movement.

Please keep in mind that the game is only designed to be played on a desktop computer.
